channel.title: Classes
channel.description: If I edit a class would it completely ruin my client? I took precautions and copied my client to my desktop and edited a class and couldn't open the client. I had to edit the client title with JFrame.class. I have no idea how to edit this to begin with so, if anyone knows please let me know. :P

item.title: Classes
item.dc:creator: @Tyler_Hostility Tyler_Hostility
item.description:
@Tyler_Hostility wrote:

How do I decompile it?

Never mind! I just downloaded DJ Java Decompiler and decompiled it, edited it and it work! This can be locked or w/e.

Read full topic

item.title: Classes
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Decompile it if you don’t have a Java file of it. Touching one letter in a .class ruins it completely and becomes useless.

Read full topic
